const Confirm = ({ nextStep, preStep, values}) => { let cont = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); return nextStep() } let back = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); return preStep() } return (

Confirm your details

  • First Name

    {values.firstName}

  • Last Name

    {values.lastName}

  • Email

    {values.email}

  • Gender

    {values.gender}

  • Phone

    {values.phone}

  • Occupation

    {values.occupation}

  • City

    {values.city}

  • Bio

    {values.bio}

); } export default Confirm;
